definition: pen/pencil/writing brush/to write or compose/the strokes of Chinese characters/classifier for sums of money, deals/CL:支[zhi1],枝[zhi1]
to record/to note/to memorize/to remember/mark/sign/classifier for blows, kicks, shots
lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

sentences.english: The action to take when the laptop lid is closed and the laptop is on AC power. Valid values are "suspend", "hibernate" and "blank".
sentences.chinese: 當使用交流電而關閉筆記型電腦上蓋時要採取的動作。

sentences.english: If you travel with your laptop, get a lock.
sentences.chinese: 如果您帶着您的筆記型電腦旅行，買把鎖。

sentences.english: Information on changing the settings of a laptop touchpad.
sentences.chinese: 更改筆記型電腦觸控板設定的資訊。

sentences.english: So, plugging into your laptop could be a tedious process.
sentences.chinese: 因此，堵到您的筆記型電腦可能是一個冗長的過程。

sentences.english: I've noticed that you carry your laptop with you everywhere you go.
sentences.chinese: 我注意到你不管到哪裏都帶著你的筆記型電腦。

sentences.english: We'e giving customers the chance to trade in laptops for handhelds.
sentences.chinese: 我們給予顧客用筆記型電腦換購掌上型電腦的機會。

sentences.english: The aircraft can be controlled by a ground-based operator using a laptop.
sentences.chinese: 該直升機可以由地面的操控員透過筆記型電腦控制。
